Name: Ballista shot
Rules: 5 damage to 1 enemy at close; 4 damage to 1 enemy at medium; 3 damage to 1 enemy at far

Name: Upgrade
Rules: Boosts all damage for an ally by 1 for 1 round

Name: Build a Tower
Rules: tap card; next round spend energy again to untap; gain a tower which does 1 damage to 5 enemies at medium and close range

Name: Boiling Oil
Rules: deal 1 damage to all enemies in range
